title: Drawing, "Textile Design: Flower and ferns", 1800–1818
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on white laid paper
inscribed: Lower left, pen and black ink, on peut varier le fond. Lower right, LAD 746.
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund
description: Stylized ferns, blue, pink, green on yellow ground decorated with rust squiggle pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design: Flower and ferns", 1800–1818.
1800–1818. Brush and gouache, graphite on white laid paper. Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund. 1957-46-23.
